state: You are now playing a fast paced episode of TextWorld! Here is how to play! First off, make an attempt to travel north. Okay, and then, take a trip east. Then, head north. With that done, move east. With that accomplished, attempt to head east. With that over with, head north. And then, make an effort to travel east. Next, try to go to the south. With that accomplished, make an attempt to venture south. Okay, and then, try to venture south. Following that, head south. That done, head east. With that accomplished, attempt to go to the north. Once you get around to doing that, make an effort to take a trip west. Okay, and then, pick up the coin from the floor of the garage. Once that's all handled, you can stop! -= Office =- Well, here we are in an office. You begin to take stock of what's in the room. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. > -= Office =-0/1
